text: Cryme Tyme was a professional wrestling tag team that was signed to World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE) and wrestled on their SmackDown brand. The team wrestled together for 4 years until they broke up on April 2, 2010. The team consisted of Shad Gaspard and JTG. They were a parody of gangstas. In 2014, they reunited on the independent circuit. They teamed until 2020. On May 17, 2020, Gaspard drowned while he saving his son. Shad was given the Warrior Award at the WWE Hall of Fame in 2022. ==Championship== *Ohio Valley Wrestling **OVW Southern Tag Team Championship (two times) ==References== ==Other websites== *JTG on WWE.com *Shad Gaspard on Online World of Wrestling Category:WWE teams and stables
title: Cryme Tyme
